body: The stupid part of it all. The so called "Blackmail" BARELY SHOWS HER OR HER BOYFRIEND! Meaning he had absolutely nothing to blackmail her with and should have gotten a slap or kick to the nads! But again, the blackmail for a NTR Chad is just a means to an end to get her on his dick! Once she tastes it once, in NTR Logic, she becomes so addicted to it, her personality instantly and unrealistic (suck it all you "It's so realistic" assholes, Cheating and Stealing of lovers scenarios' are real yes, but how NTR handles it, well you can count on two hands how many ACTUALLY make the stealing and personality change "Realistic") she's happy to betray her Lover and Principles for sex! This is why NTR is being reduced to "small doujins" like theses! It's a quick cash grab in Japan and the Non-Jap NTR Fans are happy they get "anything at all lately" LOL. It'd why the other NTR subgenre are finding more use then Vanilla NTR! Face it, being mainstream ruined Vanilla NTR and continues to ruin it!
Do not date a girl, then you could always be the one ntr others.
The first NTR rule: "Do not date a cheerleader girl!"
